title: St Germain Bistro and Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located in Old San Juan off the beaten path in a residential area. Serves slow foods with fresh ingredients, many of which are bought daily at the farmer's market, prepared to order. Has vegan choices. Crepe and wine night 6-11pm.
